statements: SELECT * FROM SoilHealthData ORDER BY pH DESC;
SELECT soil_id, soil_type FROM SoilHealthData WHERE institution_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM SoilHealthData WHERE pH > 6;
SELECT institution_id, nutrient_levels FROM SoilHealthData WHERE soil_type = 'Clay';
SELECT soil_id, pH FROM SoilHealthData ORDER BY soil_id;
SELECT * FROM SoilHealthData ORDER BY pH DESC, soil_type ASC
SELECT soil_type, pH, nutrient_levels FROM SoilHealthData WHERE pH < 6.5
SELECT institution_id, AVG(pH) AS avg_pH FROM SoilHealthData GROUP BY institution_id HAVING COUNT(soil_id) > 1
SELECT * FROM SoilHealthData WHERE soil_type ILIKE '%sandy%' OR soil_type ILIKE '%clay%'
SELECT institution_id, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM SoilHealthData GROUP BY institution_id ORDER BY total_records DESC
SELECT * FROM research_institutions;
SELECT id, name, location FROM research_institutions;
SELECT name, location FROM research_institutions WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM soil_health_data WHERE pH > 6.5;
SELECT institution_id, AVG(pH) AS average_pH FROM soil_health_data GROUP BY institution_id;
SELECT * FROM research_institutions WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, location FROM research_institutions WHERE name = 'Research Center A';
SELECT id, contact_email FROM research_institutions WHERE location = 'City X';
SELECT * FROM soil_health_data WHERE pH > 6.5 ORDER BY moisture DESC;
SELECT institution_id, AVG(pH) AS avg_pH, AVG(moisture) AS avg_moisture FROM soil_health_data GROUP BY institution_id HAVING AVG(pH) > 7.0;
SELECT * FROM ResearchInstitutions;
SELECT id, name FROM ResearchInstitutions ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM SoilHealthData WHERE ph_level > 6.5;
SELECT sample_id, nutrient_levels FROM SoilHealthData ORDER BY sample_id ASC;
SELECT user_id, access_level, last_access FROM SecureDataAccess WHERE user_id = 100;
SELECT id, name, location FROM ResearchInstitutions ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM SoilHealthData WHERE ph_level > 6.5;
SELECT name, location, COUNT(*) FROM ResearchInstitutions GROUP BY name, location HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT s.id, s.sample_id, rh.name AS research_institution_name FROM SoilHealthData s JOIN ResearchInstitutions rh ON s.id = rh.id;
SELECT * FROM SecureDataAccess WHERE last_access BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY last_access DESC;
SELECT * FROM research_institutions;
SELECT institution_name, contact_person FROM research_institutions;
SELECT * FROM soil_health_data ORDER BY sample_date DESC;
SELECT institution_name, ph_level FROM research_institutions JOIN soil_health_data ON research_institutions.institution_id = soil_health_data.data_id;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM research_institutions;
SELECT institution_name, contact_person FROM research_institutions WHERE institution_id = 1;
SELECT institution_name, contact_person FROM research_institutions WHERE institution_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM soil_health_data ORDER BY sample_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users;
SELECT * FROM research_institutions;
SELECT institution_name, location FROM research_institutions ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT data_id, sample_date, location FROM soil_health_data WHERE nitrogen_level > 10;
SELECT institution_name, contact_person FROM research_institutions WHERE location='New York';
SELECT * FROM user_accounts WHERE username='john_doe';
SELECT * FROM research_institutions
SELECT institution_name, location FROM research_institutions WHERE institution_id = 1
SELECT MIN(nitrogen_level) AS min_nitrogen, MAX(phosphorus_level) AS max_phosphorus FROM soil_health_data WHERE location = 'Field A'
SELECT institution_name, user_accounts.username FROM research_institutions INNER JOIN user_accounts ON research_institutions.institution_id = user_accounts.user_id
SELECT data_id, institution_name, sharing_date FROM data_sharing INNER JOIN research_institutions ON data_sharing.institution_id = research_institutions.institution_id ORDER BY sharing_date ASC
